intro: As a professor in a school for troubled teens you’ll have one goal - to teach, but what will you do when a troubled heart comes your way?
description:
Hentai Academy opens the door to a school full of delinquents – teens who need help with getting a headstart in life. Kenji, whose shoes you’ll step into, is passionate about giving them a second chance. Besides lectures and school trips, you will soon find yourself entangled in the matters of the heart of a fellow teacher.


IN SEARCH OF PASSION
You started a new life in a new place! The headmaster wants you to be comfortable so he introduces you to your guide - Camille - a beautiful young woman who teaches art. After a day well-spent together…


FIND LOVE WHERE IT IS LEAST EXPECTED
…you start getting closer. Where will this relationship go? What obstacles will stand in your way? Will you help the troubles of the heart just like you help the troubled teens?


KEY FEATURES:
- A story of true love full of passion and spark between the characters
- Puzzles to solve along the way with increasing difficulty
- Iconic and colorful locations
